column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I called ahead to see if there was a wait and the hostess was super confused and kept trying to make me do a reservation instead of answering the question. Finally I just hung up and still went to check them out. There was no wait at all
column2: we were immediately seated. Our waitress was very friendly but kept disappearing. We ordered the an appetizer
column3: it took a few minutes to come out but was not brought by our waitress
column4: which is fine but we did not see her again until 10 minutes after we already ate the appetizer. Â It would have been nice to place our dinner order sooner. The food was over all good
column6: and the noise level was way too loud. The music is over powering and was very hard to hear my husband who was directly in front of me.
